A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I will admit there were parts that were not the greatest early on in the movie\, however the last half of the movie was absolutely incredible.  I went into this movie hoping for something that was different than any Star Wars movie than before and I was pleased that it exceeded my expectations here.  While I came out of watching the previous 2 films for the first time unsure of how I felt about them in the franchise\, I came out of TLJ incredibly happy and absolutely loving it.
